casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Trajuan A. WASHINGTON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2019

Joseph A. Jaumann, Bridgeport, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Brett R. Aiello, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 186 Conn. App. 176, 199 A.3d 44 (2018), is denied.
